articles.title: Stock Corvette Z06 C7 Races Tuned Mustang GT, Ford Gets Handed Embarrassing Loss - autoevolution

articles.title: Childish Gambino sued by rapper alleging copyright infringement over ‘This Is America’ - NME
articles.description: Childish Gambino has been sued for copyright infringement by rapper Kidd Wes, who alleges 'This Is America' copied the latter's song 'Made In America'.
articles.content:
